info.title: WiCHacks
info.summary: WiCHacks is a women, femme, and non-binary 24-hour hackathon hosted by Women in Computing at RIT. A hackathon is a collaborative programming event in which participants create an app, website, game, or other piece of software over the course of the event.

info.title: New York Celebration of Women in Computing (NYCWiC)
info.summary: New York Celebration of Women in Computing (NYCWiC) Conference is every two years in April. Attendees will be women in industry and academia from all over New York state. NYCWiC hopes to encourage women to complete their studies in computing by exploring careers and meeting women leaders from business, industry and academia.
